mapper.select: SELECT b.topic_id FROM borrow br JOIN book b ON br.book_id = b.book_id WHERE br.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY b.topic_id HAVING COUNT(*) = ( SELECT MAX(borrow_count) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS borrow_count FROM borrow br2 JOIN book b2 ON br2.book_id = b2.book_id WHERE br2.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY b2.topic_id ) AS subquery ) ORDER BY MAX(br.created_at) DESC LIMIT 1;
